title: Hour 1 - Adam Caplan (07-06-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Adam Caplan (07-06-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss the Washington Redskins having discussions about changing their team name and the pressure they are facing to do so. NFL Insider Adam Caplan joins the show to tell the guys if Colin Kaepernick will play in the NFL again after his controversial tweet about the 4th of July. They also debate the NBA bubble whether or not it will work out as the NBA continues the 2020 season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
